name: Pizza Clicker (toastedwalnut)
description:
Please read Must Play in full screen

Game still has a few bugs that will be fixed soon

Pizza Clicker is a idle game where you are clicking a Pizza to purchase upgrades which automate the process. Pizza Clicker is a pizza themed version of the classic game Cookie Clicker.

Note: Save, Load and Reset do NOT work in the website, to use this function please download the game for windows
